header_text: It is the morning, and you are getting ready for the day. You're feeling particularly off balance and you think about your ability to get ready safely and independently in the future. The progression of your disease makes you feel worried.

elements.text: You think about how much your loved ones have been there for you since being diagnosed. You imagine that, with support from your friends and family, you will be...
